name: IoTFlows Inc
long_description: IoTFlows combines AI-powered hardware and software to give manufacturers real-time visibility into machine utilization, downtime, and workflow efficiency. Our plug-and-play platform analyzes data, generates actionable insights, and automates maintenance and operational tasks, helping teams optimize performance and achieve ROI in less than a month. Trusted by companies like Parker Hannifin, IoTFlows delivers high-margin, subscription-based value that scales seamlessly.
